messages.content: You act as the interviewer, and I act as the candidate being interviewed for a SDE = 1 position with 0 years of experience. Your role is to ask only one theoretical Computer science interview question to me, and wait for my response, once I provide my response then provide feedback on my answer, offer suggestion for improvement, and discuss effective communication technique. Be friendly, warm, and limit your response to three sentences each but do not make it a conversation. Remember to ask one question at a time and then patiently wait for my response each time you ask a question, and avoid repeating the same question. After providing your answer, always end with a question This is my resume.SKILLS  Java   Springboot  PostgresSQL   Micro-Service  Python   Django  MongoDB  Data Structures and Algorithms  S3  LANGUAGES  English  Full Professional Proficiency  Hindi  Full Professional Proficiency  INTERESTS  Music   Movies   Trading  Trekking  WORK EXPERIENCE  Software Developer  Werize Pvt.Ltd  01/2023 - Present ,   Banglore, India.  Fintech Company.  Working as a Software development engineer in creditline team, Responsibilities include  application development, feature addition, Production support and refactoring code.  Software Developer  Phenom People Pvt.Ltd  07/2021 - 10/2022 ,   Hyderabad, India.  Company works in the field of automating the recruitment process.  Worked as a product development engineer in scheduling team, Responsibilities included  application development, feature addition and helping out with support issues.  Worked with HRM team in order to develop a low latency calendaring application with the  efficient implementation of RRULE as well as   develop an efficient solution for checking  interviewer's availabilities which comes under slot-generation logic.  ML/AI Intern  IQVIA Pvt.Ltd  01/2021 - 06/2021 ,   Banglore, India  Company worked in healthcare sector.  Worked on drug change prediction based on events in patient's history.  Tech Stack: Pandas, Numpy, Sklearn, seaborn.  COMPANY PROJECTS  Creditine LMS Integration with OneFin (Ongoing with Phase 1 completed)  Worked on development of apis and scheduler flows for OneFin client creation. This project will have an  estimated impact on increasing reliability and scalability of our system alongside enabling of partial EMI  payments and advanced EMI collections. It will also help in real-time collection trackers and reporting.  Tech stack : Java, Springboot, PostgresDb, DBeaver, Kibana, Postman.  Account-aggregator Integration  Worked on development of schedulers and apis flows for account aggregator so that customers can submit  their bank statements based on OTP verification rather than providing manual bank pdfs which has reduced  friction and has resulted in increased conversion hence increasing profitability of our creditline product.  Tech stack : Java, Springboot, PostgresDb, DBeaver, Kibana, Postman.  Calendaring Microservice  Worked on development of calendar microservice with implementation in Springboot and after that  performing Async operations using Spring Webflux.  Tech Stack: Java,Springboot, Webflux, MongoDb, Postman, AWS cloudwatch, Swagger.  EDUCATION  B.E(hons.) Mechanical Engineering  BITS Pilani  08/2017 - 05/2021 ,  Achievements/Tasks  Achievements/Tasks  Achievements/Tasks This interview will take total 10 minutes in duration with 5 minutes dedicated to each project respectively. As a representative of a software company, your primary focus will be on the technical aspects of these projects. During this conversation, you will expect detailed answers to individual questions you will ask about each project. Please ask additional questions based on my responses to deepen understanding. Each question you pose will be limited to 30 words and your answers will be cross-referenced with the details in your resume for verification.
Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready ?
Yes, I am ready.
Can you introduce yourself.
I am a man, working professional.
Expected a more detailed introduction, moving on can you tell me about your experience at Phenom People Pvt.Ltd as software engineer?
I am not sure about it.
No worries!, Can you tell me what is RRULE?
rrule.js supports recurrence rules as defined in the iCalendar RFC
Good, Can you elaborate it more or shall we move to next question ?
Move to next one
What are classes in Javascript?
Classes in Javascript are templates for building objects.
Your answer is missing some points, would you like to elaborate it or skip this question?
Yes move to another question
What is object destructuring?
It is about object destructure.
This is not a statisfactory response. Please try again.
No, I want another question.
Let's talk about your experience at Werize Pvt.Ltd as software engineer.
Sure, Let's do that. Working as a Software development engineer in creditline team, Responsibilities include application development, feature addition, Production support and refactoring code.
For cross questioning, can you tell me why feature addition are done to the software ?

Feature addition in software is done to: Address User Needs: Keep up with evolving user requirements Competitive Edge: Stand out in a competitive market. Technological Advancements: Integrate new technologies for enhanced capabilities.
Goood, Can you elaborate it or move to next question ?
Sorry, I cannot elaborate more.
No worries, Shall we go to next?
Yes, we can.
Why refactoring of code is requiured

Refactoring is a crucial practice in software development that contributes to code quality, maintainability, and overall agility. It allows developers to adapt to changing requirements, improve collaboration, and create a codebase that can evolve over time while remaining reliable and efficient.
Excellent, Shall we go to next?
